name: Tower Vibes
description:
Tower Vibes is a short LARP inspired by Riding the Ley Line (from Moss, a.k.a beatingthebinary) for finding the fantastical in the mundane. A PDF version of Tower Vibes is available at the bottom of the page. 

================================================================

You are a wizard; tired after a long day of work in your revered tower. 

The tower is old and dust can always be found somewhere, but it is yours.

Your tower may hark back to times of old, but you are a contemporary wizard. 

You relish in current technologies and trends. 

And, unlike your predecessors, you are content with knowing you can relax and not delve into the late hours of the night toiling over tomes. 

You can just chill.

You've spent the day crafting intricate spells and so now you can create a relaxing environment to rest your weary wizard body.

To start —- 

What color does relaxing feel like today?

Search that color on your music player of choice and randomize the songs.

Start listening. 

Roll a D20.

Put that number of songs on a playlist for this day's vibe.

The playlist doesn't have to be the songs in the order you listen to them, it's all about which ones feel right.

Next —- 

What animal embodies relaxing to you?

Use the first letter of that animal to decide what food to eat.

For example:

     Panda — Pizza

     Turtle — Tacos

     Axolotl — Avocado Toast

If you’re stuck, look up a list of foods that start with the letter and roll a D20.

Now, choose —-

Air, Earth, Fire, or Water?

If you cannot decide, roll a D4.  

If you chose:

Air —   Enjoy a story or show and let your mind and 

        imagination wander away from work. 

Earth — You may be in a high tower, but find a way to 

        feel grounded. Whether that be through meditation, 

        journaling, dancing…

    

Fire —  Light your favorite candle, incense… 

        Make your tower smell comforting.

Water — Bathe in your finest elixirs.

And lastly —- 

Change out of your robes, grab your potion of choice, and 

take a long rest.
